name: Omgili
tag_list: search, forums, discussions, boards, omgili, reviews, ugc, cgm
overview:
Omgili is a vertical search engine that focuses on “many to many” user generated content platforms, such as, forums, Discussion groups, answer boards and others. This crawler based, vertical search engine, scans millions of online discussions worldwide in over 100,000 boards and forums, and is able to differentiate between discussion entities, such as, title, topic, answer and post date. Users can use Omgili to find consumer opinions, debates, discussions, personal experiences, answers and solutions.

Omgili Ltd. is a web based information services startup company. Omgili Ltd.was established in December 2006 and in April 2007 received seed financing from Pitango venture capital.

Other Omgili sub-domains offer additional tools for searching user generated content and for monitoring buzz. amongst these are Omgili Buzz, which Gives a daily overview of popular discussion topics, Omgili Graphs - A web tool that creates graphs of online chatter, Omgili Product Reviews - Displays a gauge of consumer sentiment towards a product, as it is portrayed in leading online review sites like: Amazon.com, Shopping.com, Target.com, CNet.com, YahooShopping and Pricegrabber.com and Omgili Search Aid, which Gives suggestions for search terms that are related to different topics.
